name: Jellyboy's Adventure
description:
You play as a squishy shape-shifting piece of jelly called Jellyboy. All he wants to do is reach the end of the level but keeps falling off! Perhaps he could do it if a kind person in front of a screen could help him in some way?

Reach the end by changing shape to solve various physics-based puzzle platforming maneuvers! Dynamically switch characters as either a squishy cube with wall running and sliding mechanics or a hard bouncy ball to achieve massive movement potential by chaining movements together! Can you reach the end?

Developed in the Game Design III course, at the University of the Witwaterstrand.

Feel free to donate to my Paypal at paypal.me/DarthMurky to support me in my studies :) Have a great day ^^
